confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Wall[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Shield[/color] skill.
As you upgrade the [color=title]Wall[/color] skill, its [color=title]duration[/color] will increase. The final upgrade turns the wall into a useful [color=title]weapon[/color].

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Shield[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The beginning upgrade to [color=title]Wall[/color] extends the [color=title]duration[/color] of the wall and lowers the [color=title]recharge time[/color].

The last [color=title]Wall[/color] upgrade maximizes the [color=title]duration[/color] of the wall. The [color=title]Wall[/color] now has [color=title]deadly spikes[/color] on the opposite side. The spikes will destroy anything that touches them.
